EF_PSRAM_CTRL.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_PSRAM_CTRL_V2.description: A Controller for Quad I/O SPI PSRAM
EF_PSRAM_CTRL_V2.author: Efabless Corp.

CF_UART.description: UART with a programmable baud rate generator and RX/TX FIFOs
CF_UART.author: Efabless Corp.

MS_CLK_RST.description: All digital Clock and Reset Manager.
MS_CLK_RST.author: Efabless Corp.

MS_SPI_XIP_CACHE.description: AHB-Lite SPI Flash memory controller with direct mapped cache and support for XiP.
MS_SPI_XIP_CACHE.author: Efabless Corp.

MS_DMAC_AHBL.description: Direct Memory Access Controller (DMAC) with AHB-lite bus interface.
MS_DMAC_AHBL.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_AES.description: Verilog implementation of the symmetric block cipher AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) as specified in NIST FIPS 197. This implementation supports 128 and 256 bit keys.
EF_AES.author: Joachim Strombergson

SW_AES.description: Verilog implementation of the symmetric block cipher AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) as specified in NIST FIPS 197. This implementation supports 128 and 256 bit keys.
SW_AES.author: Joachim Strombergson

EF_SHA256.description: Hardware implementation of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function.
EF_SHA256.author: Joachim Strombergson

SW_SHA256.description: Hardware implementation of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function.
SW_SHA256.author: Joachim Strombergson

EF_ACMP_DI.description: A digital interface for the EF_R2RVC02 analog comparator
EF_ACMP_DI.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_DAC1001_DI.description: 10-Bit Switching Capacitor Array Digital to Analog Converter (DAC) with a digital interface.
EF_DAC1001_DI.author: Ahmed Reda

EF_ADCS1008A.description: A digital controller for EF_ADCS1008NC, 8 Channel 10-bit SAR ADC
EF_ADCS1008A.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_PIN_MUX.description: Pin Multiplexing Fabric; 32 pins x four functions per pin.
EF_PIN_MUX.author: Efabless Corp.

sky130_ef_ip__xtal_osc_32k_DI.description: Digital wrapper for an ultra-low-power, low speed crystal oscillator
sky130_ef_ip__xtal_osc_32k_DI.author: Marwan Abbas

sky130_ef_ip__rc_osc_500k.description: A 500kHz oscillator using a current-starved ring oscillator
sky130_ef_ip__rc_osc_500k.author: Tim Edwards

sky130_ef_ip__rc_osc_500k_DI.description: Digital wrapper for A 500kHz oscillator using a current-starved ring oscillator
sky130_ef_ip__rc_osc_500k_DI.author: Marwan Abbas

sky130_ef_ip__xtal_osc_16M_DI.description: Digital wrapper for high speed crystal oscillator
sky130_ef_ip__xtal_osc_16M_DI.author: Marwan Abbas

EF_CLK_RST_V2.description: All digital Clock and Reset Manager with on-chip crystal oscillators.
EF_CLK_RST_V2.author: Bassant Hassan

CF_I2S.owner: ChipFoundry, a DBA of Umbralogic Technologies LLC
CF_I2S.author: Efabless Corp.

usb_cdc.description: An implementation of the Full Speed (12Mbit/s) USB communications device class
usb_cdc.author: ulixxe

usb_cdc_wrapper.description: Bus wrapper for usb cdc which utilizes fifo
usb_cdc_wrapper.author: Efabless Corp.

CF_I2C.description: I2C master controller with an APB interface
CF_I2C.author: ChipFoundry, a DBA of Umbralogic Technologies LLC
CF_I2C.owner: ChipFoundry, a DBA of Umbralogic Technologies LLC

CF_TMR32.author: Efabless Corp.
CF_TMR32.owner: ChipFoundry, a DBA of Umbralogic Technologies LLC

CF_SPI.description: SPI master controller with receive and transmit FIFOs.
CF_SPI.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_QSPI_FLASH_WRITER.description: A Quad SPI Flash Writer used to program flash. It can be used along with flash controller to program the flash then read from it.
EF_QSPI_FLASH_WRITER.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_QSPI_XIP_CTRL.description: A QSPI XiP Flash COntroller with a parameterized Direct-Mapped Cache.
EF_QSPI_XIP_CTRL.author: Efabless Corp.

EF_R2RVC02.description: Rail-Rail Dual Channel Voltage Comparator, Dual Power Supply.
EF_R2RVC02.author: Efabless

IP_Utilities.description: A set of utilities that can be used to develop digital IPs in Verilog HDL
IP_Utilities.author: Efabless Corp.

NC_AES.description: Hardware AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) accelerator implementing  NIST FIPS 197 symmetric block cipher. Supports 128-bit and 256-bit keys  with encryption and decryption capabilities. Iterative implementation  processes one 128-bit block at a time with 4 parallel S-boxes.
NC_AES.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_CRC.description: Configurable CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) accelerator with support for 7/8/16/32-bit polynomials, programmable seeds, bit/byte reversal, output XOR masking, input FIFO buffering, and DMA support for high-throughput data integrity verification
NC_CRC.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_DMAC.description: 6-Channel DMA Controller with integrated DMAMUX for Cortex-M0+ microcontrollers. Supports memory-to-memory, memory-to-peripheral, and peripheral-to-memory transfers with 8/16/32-bit data widths, circular buffer mode, and priority arbitration.
NC_DMAC.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_GPIO.description: 16-pin GPIO controller with 4 operational modes (Input, Output, Alternate Function, Analog), atomic bit manipulation, per-pin interrupt generation, and configuration lock mechanism. Designed for Cortex-M0+ microcontrollers with APB3 slave interface.
NC_GPIO.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_I2C.description: APB3-wrapped I2C master supporting 7-bit addressing, start/repeated start/stop generation, single-byte read/write, and write-multiple transactions. Includes prescale divider and sticky missed-ACK indication.
NC_I2C.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_I2S.description: Full-duplex I2S audio interface controller with Voice Activity Detection (VAD) for low-power always-listening applications. Supports I2S Philips, MSB/LSB-justified, and PCM formats with configurable data widths (16/24/32-bit) and sample rates (8-96 kHz).
NC_I2S.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_PWM.description: Advanced PWM Timer with 16-bit counter, 4 PWM channels, complementary outputs, dead-time generator, and break input
NC_PWM.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_RTC.description: Hardware real-time clock (RTC) with BCD calendar, dual programmable alarms, periodic wakeup timer, timestamp capture, tamper detection, backup registers, smooth digital calibration, and comprehensive low-power support. The RTC is driven by an external 32.768 kHz clock and provides a 1 Hz calendar tick through a dual prescaler chain (7-bit asynchronous + 15-bit synchronous).
NC_RTC.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_SHA256.description: Hardware accelerator for SHA-256 and SHA-224 cryptographic hash functions as specified in FIPS 180-4. The core processes 512-bit message blocks and produces 256-bit (SHA-256) or 224-bit (SHA-224) digest outputs. Note: The core does NOT implement padding - the caller is expected to handle message padding according to the SHA specification.
NC_SHA256.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_SPI.description: Full-duplex SPI master controller with configurable frame size, clock polarity/phase, hardware chip select, 8-entry TX/RX FIFOs, programmable thresholds, interrupt and DMA support for Cortex-M0+ microcontrollers
NC_SPI.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_TMR.description: 32-bit General Purpose Timer with Capture/Compare, PWM, and Encoder Interface
NC_TMR.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_UART.description: Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART) controller with full-duplex operation, configurable frame format, FIFO buffers, DMA support, and interrupt generation
NC_UART.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_WWDT.description: Windowed watchdog timer with APB3 slave interface. Provides configurable prescaler and window thresholds, early warning interrupt, and optional watchdog reset output.
NC_WWDT.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_XIP.description: AHB-Lite XiP controller for external Quad I/O SPI flash with direct-mapped read-only cache and a keyed bit-bang programmer. XiP reads are at A[24]=0 and programmer registers are at A[24]=1. Flash bus defaults to XiP on reset.
NC_XIP.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_COMMON.description: Common IP utility modules and components for NativeChips IPs
NC_COMMON.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_AMBA.description: Lightweight Verilog-2005 AMBA building blocks for MCU-class SoCs, including AHB-Lite crossbar components, AHB-to-APB bridge integration wrapper, and AHB-to-synchronous-SRAM bridges
NC_AMBA.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_RV32.description: 3-stage RV32IM/RV32IMC-capable CPU core family with optional debug wrapper and AHB-Lite interfaces. Supports single and dual-port variants with optional MSI and JTAG debug module.
NC_RV32.author: NativeChips.ai

NC_SOCGEN.description: YAML-driven generator for the compute subsystem of MCU-class SoCs. Emits structural Verilog RTL, filelists, register specs, address/IRQ maps, and firmware bring-up packs.
NC_SOCGEN.author: NativeChips.ai
